author: arunhep
body:
this change is also in 93X with PR #21370 
# Summary of changes in Global Tags 

## Upgrade

   * **PhaseII 2023 realistic scenario** : [94X_upgrade2023_realistic_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/94X_upgrade2023_realistic_v3) as [100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/100X_upgrade2023_realistic_v1/94X_upgrade2023_realistic_v3): 
      * update of Jet Energy Corrections mentioned here : https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21370#issuecomment-346689916
title: [10.0.X] GT Updates : PhaseII GT updated with the new Jet Energy Corrections
